content.raw:
These might be problems with ign-gui:

1. I can scale the time panel, which actually translates it vertically or horizontally. This can lead to loosing the time panel completely. Is it possible to disable scaling of this widget?
2. On my screen, the “RTF” text is chopped off at the top.

    ![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3749519891-chopped_rtf.png)
3. The background of the “100%” label and the slide out drawer do not match. Can you make them both 100% transparent. After some use and experience we can increase opacity if the text is hard to read.

‌
